verbs.description: A Nigerian Muslim group , the Muslim Rights Concern ( MURIC ) [V: has] described U.S President Donald Trump ’s claim that Christians are being killed in Nigeria as ‘ prejudiced , parochial and un - presidential.’ The group said this in a statement signed by its director , Professor Ishaq Akintola in response to an assertion by Trump that the United States will not condone the continuous killing of Christians at a meeting with his Nigerian counterpart on Monday .

A Nigerian Muslim group , the Muslim Rights Concern ( MURIC ) has described U.S President Donald Trump ’s claim that Christians [V: are] being killed in Nigeria as ‘ prejudiced , parochial and un - presidential.’ The group said this in a statement signed by its director , Professor Ishaq Akintola in response to an assertion by Trump that the United States will not condone the continuous killing of Christians at a meeting with his Nigerian counterpart on Monday .
